pt.runtime

Class ParaTaskHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.runtime.ParaTaskHelper

  • public class ParaTaskHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a helper class which provides information regarding runtime constants such as PT_PREFIX, WORKER_SLEEP_DELAY, ANY_THREAD_TASK etc. The latter (i.e. ANY_THREAD_TASK) indicates if a specific task could be executed by arbitrary threads or not.
    This class also reflects a method if it is provided the name of the class which contains that method, the name of the method and the list of arguments. It should be mentioned that, in order to reflect the asked method, a function in this class:
    getDeclaredMethod
    goes through the super classes and enclosing classes as well!
    Since:
    4/9/2014
    Author:
    Mostafa Mehrabi
